import React from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Header() { const cartItems = useSelector(state => state.cart.cartItems); // get cartItems array const totalItems = cartItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + item.quantity, 0); // total quantity return ( <> React-Bootstrap
Home Electronics Jewellery
Cart ({totalItems}) ) }
